reports.title: CRITICAL: Deposit Replay Attack Test
reports.description: Test if deposits can be replayed on L2
reports.impact:
L1StandardBridge may be vulnerable to deposit replay attacks
Missing transaction nonce validation in deposit processing
L2StandardBridge vulnerable to message replay via hash collision
reproduction: 2. Execute test scenario: Test if deposits can be replayed on L2
4. L1StandardBridge may be vulnerable to deposit replay attacks
5. Missing transaction nonce validation in deposit processing
6. L2StandardBridge vulnerable to message replay via hash collision
reports.mitigation:
Implement strict nonce validation for all deposit transactions
Use cryptographic commitment scheme to prevent replay
Add transaction hash tracking to detect duplicates
Implement robust message hash verification with salt
evidence: depositETH function does not validate unique transaction identifiers
Message hash validation insufficient or missing

reports.title: CRITICAL: Message Authentication Bypass Test
reports.description: Test if unauthorized messages can be injected
reproduction: 2. Execute test scenario: Test if unauthorized messages can be injected
reports.mitigation:
Implement message nonce tracking
Add unique message hash verification
Use incrementing sequence numbers per sender
evidence: No nonce or unique identifier validation
Same message can be relayed multiple times
